Preterit.turoyo: mašəġleiḏe w-foṯe 537; 60/104; hul d-mašəġlaiḏa; bəṯṯər me-d-matəmla u=layš-ayḏa 538; 78/190; mašəġġearʕe d-as=sefoqe 539; 44/63; mašəġliaǧ=ǧurḥe b-am=maye d-u=oksižan, manḏ̣əfili b-i=ispərto 540; 7/11; ʕdimomašəġolan w-lo=naḏ̣ifo 2/24; ašərmašəġġearʕe d-as=sefoqe
translations: ‘They certainly licked the bottom of the plates clean’ (
they ate all the food up); 44/63

Infectum-wa.turoyo: ḥzeliḥḏoʕal u=baḥar, mašəġo-wafoṯa 548; prs 119/25; əzzá-way-na, amṭí-way-naaḥ=ḥeṭe, maḥtí-way-na-nne b-lăganrabo, mašiġí-way-na-nnetre=feme b-mayeǧamude

Imperativ.turoyo: mgarwonofoṯa, məlle-la l-u=ḥakimo, omərašiġ-a b-u=baḥar, g-nayḥo 549; prs 119/19; mašiġuiḏe u foṯe

Part. Pass..turoyo: ko-ḥoyər: kaʔanno as=sefoqayḏe-stemašiġe 552; 112/155; maqalbí-way-naaḥ=ḥeṭemašiġ-anəkbayn am=mayeraṯuḥeʕal i=nuroLehrbuch17.5.3;
